lead_paragraph: One of America's landmark homes, the Miami Beach mansion that once belonged to Italian fashion designer Gianni Versace, was sold at an auction on Tuesday for $41.5 million to a business group that includes the owners of the Jordache jeans brand.

headline.main: Versace's Former Miami Mansion Sells for $41.5 Million at Auction
headline.print_headline: Versace's Former Miami Mansion Sells for $41.5 Million at Auction
